short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that transforms all the images you see into photos of Max Nikias.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt like you needed more President Max Nikias in your life?

Us too.

That's why we created "MAXimize," a Chrome extension meant to bring purpose into every Trojan's life. It automatically scans every website you visit and replaces every photo it finds with a high-quality picture of President Max Nikias of the University of Southern California.
